name: No e-mails on phone since setting change by Microsoft
description:
## Lab info
For this challenge you'll need the M365 and Azure Virtual Lab

Username: ctfadmin@M365B517776.onmicrosoft.com
Password: Zag20489

## challenge info
In 2015 Dr. Pamela Lillian Isley, PhD added a account to her phone to receive important e-mails from clients. It is now December 2022 and Dr Isley noticed she had not received any emails for some months.

When she tries to retrieve new emails, she gets "Logon error" returned. The flag is the name of the setting that causes this behaviour.
view:
• Challenge
  • 111 Solves

name: Create Azure deployment file
description:
## Lab info
For this challenge you'll need the M365 and Azure Virtual Lab

Username: ctfadmin@M365B517776.onmicrosoft.com
Password: Zag20489

## Challenge info
The MSP for the justice league has decided to start using [CIPP](https://cipp.app). To install CIPP they are using the default Azure Deployment file.

They've decided to start deploying CIPP a lot and want the file to be prepared with more settings:

* automatically populate the github access token
* create a premium subscription, instead of consumption model
* Enable app insights

The flag is a file that uses the CIPP base as a template, with the added settings.
view:
• Challenge
  • 29 Solves

Create Azure deployment file

100

Lab info

For this challenge you'll need the M365 and Azure Virtual Lab

Username: ctfadmin@M365B517776.onmicrosoft.com Password: Zag20489

Challenge info

The MSP for the justice league has decided to start using CIPP. To install CIPP they are using the default Azure Deployment file.

They've decided to start deploying CIPP a lot and want the file to be prepared with more settings:

  • automatically populate the github access token
  • create a premium subscription, instead of consumption model
  • Enable app insights

The flag is a file that uses the CIPP base as a template, with the added settings.

name: Create Teams capable chatbot
description:
## Lab Info
For this challenge you'll need your own Azure subscription or virtual lab

## Challenge info
Azure services are getting more and more advanced, next to PaaS and IaaS there are so many more options. For this challenge, you'll have to create your own Chatbot. There's no coding experience required. Keywords; Q&AMaker & Quickstart: question answering

The flag is a link to your chatbot, where we can ask it the question "What is the best CTF in the world?"

name: Time: Connect to API
description:
**WARNING:** Starting this challenge by using the link below starts a 30 minute timer that cannot be stopped. There are no retries. Click on the URL below to start the timer and receive your token. Remember to add your own e-mail address to the URL:
https://cyberdrainctf.azurewebsites.net/api/API2022?email=YOUREMAILADDRESSHERE@EMAIL.COM

You need to connect to the API at https://cyberdrainctf.azurewebsites.net/api/CTFAPI succesfully. You have 30 minutes to figure this out.

When you've connected succesfully you will receive a token, use this to claim your flag:

https://cyberdrainctf.azurewebsites.net/api/API2022?email=YOUREMAIL@EMAIL.COM&Token=YOURTOKEN
view:
• Challenge
  • 24 Solves

name: Resolve problems in script
description:
The following script fails due to multiple mistakes, both in logic and commands. Undeclared variables are NOT an error in the context of this question.

These exersises do not use actual data. You can generate your own example data.

The flag are the line numbers that need to be changed, seperated by a comma. example: 1,2,3

```
$Items = Get-ChildItem "C:\Temp"
foreach($Item in $Items){
write-host $Item
    #)
write-host "moving on to more important stuff"
#we will now get a list of files to play with
#this data comes from very important sources
#we only want to filter on all items that have the name John
$itemlist = get-item "C:\Temp" | Where-Object -Property Name -eq "John"
#then we want to loop through the list and get the items that make john happy
#his list of happystuff is:
# Beer,Cookies,French Fries
$HappyStuff = "Beer, Cookies, French Fries"
if($HappyStuff -in $ListOfJohnsCurrentStuff){


}

if($HappyStuff -notin $ListOfJohnsCurrentStuff){
   New-file "C:\Temp\JohnsNotHappyStuff.txt"
}
```
view:
• Challenge
  • 42 Solves

name: Guess Who?
description:
The Riddler has poisoned an innocent member of the public. Use his clues to find who it was before it's too late!

Their favourite place contains Shire

Their worst place starts with a C or a D

Their favourite number is between 8000000000000 and 9000000000000

Their favourite colour is Gold, Blue, Pink or Green

Their worst colour is not Emerald, Red, Gray or Orange

Their firstname is 7 characters long.

The third letter of their last name is R

The Flag is the GUID of the correct entry.
view:

  • 140 Solves

## challenge info

**WARNING:** Starting this challenge by using the link below starts a 30 minute timer that cannot be stopped. There are no retries. Click on the URL below to start the timer and receive your token. Remember to add your own e-mail address to the URL:
https://cyberdrainctf.azurewebsites.net/api/email2022?email=YOUREMAILADDRESSHERE@EMAIL.COM

A hacker is extorting the company. Find out how the hacker is getting a hold of emails. Your returned GUID can help you find this.

When you've found the reason, enter the correct token into the following url:
